PrivacyPolicy.Description: This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our artificial intelligence service.

CollectionOfInformation.PersonalInformation: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and other contact details.
CollectionOfInformation.UsageData: We may gather usage data, including information about your interactions, preferences, and settings within the service.

PurposesOfUse.ServiceProvision: We utilize your information to provide, maintain, and improve the functionality of Jarvis AI.
PurposesOfUse.Communication: We may use your contact information to communicate with you about updates, announcements, and support-related matters.
PurposesOfUse.Analytics: We analyze usage data to gain insights into how Jarvis AI is being utilized by our users.

DataSharingAndDisclosure.ThirdPartyProviders: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in delivering and maintaining Jarvis AI.

DataProtection.SecurityMeasures: We take appropriate measures to protect your information and ensure its confidentiality and integrity.
DataProtection.LegalDisclosure: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or if we believe that such action is necessary to protect our rights or the rights of others.

PrivacyPolicy.Consent: By using Jarvis AI, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your information as described in this Privacy Policy.
PrivacyPolicy.Contact: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices or how your information is handled, please contact us at [Your Contact Information].
PrivacyPolicy.Updates: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed.
